items.title: After WhatsApp, Instagram For iPad Is Coming This Year, Reports Claim
items.description: Days after Meta release WhatsApp for iPad for the first time, reports emerge that Instagram will come to iPad in the coming months.

items.title: Elden Ring: Nightreign’s First Patch Doesn’t Address The Game’s Biggest Problems
items.description: The first update for Elden Ring Nightreign includes bug fixes and help for solo players, but the game's biggest issues remain.
